titles.title: Swain County Settlement Act of 1996

To provide for the settlement of claims of Swain County, North Carolina, against the United States arising under the agreement entered into on July 30, 1943, by the Tennessee Valley Authority, the State of North Carolina, Swain County, North Carolina, and the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Lands.

bill.summary: 9/18/1996--Introduced. Swain County Settlement Act of 1996 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to complete the Park Road pursuant to a specified 1943 agreement with the State of North Carolina, the Tennessee Valley Authority, and Swain County, North Carolina. Instructs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to Swain County upon completion of the road, according to prescribed conditions. Limits legal fees which may be paid for services rendered in connection with the claims settled by this Act. Imposes a penalty for violations of such fee limitation.
